ygData.subject: Re: Chivtron Defense
ygData.msgSnippet: The Maximals, Deemos, and McGowan s group should be far away by now. Burning Hammer: Aerotaur? Burning Hammer walked out and picked him up. Burning Hammer: How

From: "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@...>

The Maximals, Deemos, and McGowan's group should be far away by now.

Burning Hammer: Aerotaur?

Burning Hammer walked out and picked him up.

Burning Hammer: How many?

He carried Aerotaue inside and put him into a CR Chamber. My other 3 bots
come in.

Arrow: That battle was disgraceful. They got the jump on us, and they won
this time! Ridiculous! The idea of those idiots beating us is madness! All
because I don't have command over the shields! I demand to be able to
control those shields, and I want it right now, or I'm taking Zeniith and
leaving.

Perplex: I also want to be able to command the ship, Arrow is right.

Arrow patted Perplex on the back and put his arm around him.

Burning Hammer: I think I also need that, or else some of us may end up
perishing in the next battle. I have to agree with them.

Zeni: Can I have power over the shields?

Arrow: If I have power over them, then you have power over them, you really
don't need it. Well? What's it going to be? I get my shield control, as does
Perplex and Burning Hammer, or we leave...

----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 03, 2001 6:01 PM
Subject: Re: Chivtron Defense


> ::Aerotaur::
>     "We can't let them get awa..."  He drops unconscious to the ground,
the
> Cybertronian equivalent of adrenaline wearing off and shock setting in.
